replies.txt_content:
标题: 服务端老是自动崩溃

我的服务端老是崩溃，每次崩溃前会出现下面一段代码，求教如何解决，谢谢！




代码：
[20:38:25] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: The server has stopped responding!
[20:38:25] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Please report this to http://www.spigotmc.org/
[20:38:25] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Be sure to include ALL relevant console errors and Minecraft crash reports
[20:38:25] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Spigot version: git-Spigot-59b08be-0899683 (MC: 1.8)
[20:38:25] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: ------------------------------
[20:38:25] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Server thread dump (Look for plugins here before reporting to Spigot!):
[20:38:25] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: ------------------------------
[20:38:25] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Current Thread: Server thread
[20:38:25] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]:

zhxzhc20123 发表于 2016-4-3 21:14
应该是你电脑cpu满了
应该不是，完整代码过长，我不能发出来，我试试附件
